data.methodology: Analyzed 12+ top 10 lists and reviews from Sleep Advisor, New York Magazine - The Strategist, Sleepopolis, NapLab, Mattress Nerd, Esquire, Forbes, Sleep Doctor, Tom's Guide, eachnight, Youtube. Weighted by: Source credibility (Tier 1/Tier 2/Tier 3), mentions of cooling and pressure relief. Consensus picks: Products that appeared most frequently across multiple lists as being good for side sleepers and/or hot sleepers.
